DOC.brief_title: Athena Pelvic Muscle Trainer - DUETS Trial
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase IV , prospective , open-label , multi-center , observational study ass effectiveness Athena PMT relieve eliminate symptom female urinary incontinence . The study enlist approximately 100 Nurse-Practitioners Women 's Health principle investigator community-based primary care center ( OB-GYN , Internal Medicine , Family Practices Women 's Health Centers ) enroll approximately 500 subject suffer urge and/or stress urinary incontinence may benefit strengthen Kegel muscle pelvic floor .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age 30 70 year 2 . Suffer urgeincontinence , stress incontinence incontinence mixed etiology may benefit strengthen Kegel muscle electrical stimulation 3 . Able provide inform consent physically able comply protocol requirement . 4 . Experience one incontinence episode per week . 5 . Women childbearing potential must negative urine blood pregnancy test within 7 day prior initiation treatment . 6 . Subject may postmenopausal , surgically sterilize , willing use acceptable method birth control ( e.g. , hormonal contraceptive , intra uterine device ( IUD ) , diaphragm spermicide , condom spermicide abstinence ) screen visit duration study participation . 7 . Have positive response two question Athena Questionnaire 1 . Neurological deficiency permit proper sensory perception stimulation . 2 . Is currently pregnant , lactate attempt get pregnant 3 . Has cardiac pacemaker history rate conductive disturbance 4 . Has anatomical vaginal structure permit proper complete placement trainer . 5 . Has irregular menstrual bleeding cycle . 6 . Has urinary vaginal infection , localized lesion , undiagnosed symptom . 7 . Has history symptom urinary retention . 8 . Has cancer life expectancy le one year 9 . Recreational drug use 10 . Consume three caffeine beverage daily 11 . Consume 12 alcoholic drink per day 12 . Significant drug use ( cause diuresis urinary retention 13 . Allergy sensitivity material Athena PMT 14 . Participation another clinical trial within past 3 month 15 . Subjects morbidly obese ( BMI > 35 ) 16 . Subjects chronically smoke ( > 10 cigarette per day ) 17 . Subjects require heavy lifting ( > 40 pound regularly ) 18 . Surgery within past six month incontinence , use incontinence device 19 . Currently take cholinergic anticholinergic drug prescription nonprescription drug may increase decrease volume frequency urination thus , may confound result study , except , opinion investigator .
